data.message: Hello!  My birthday was 7/15.  Is there a way to see and share my birthday video now?  I don't see it on my page anymore. If not, can you recreate it?  Thanks!  :-)

replies.message: Hey Eddie. You can find more information about seeing and sharing your Birthday Video here: http://bit.ly/2uAsbfI. -Stephanie

Thanks Stephanie.  Unfortunately, the video is no longer on my page, unless I'm looking in the wrong place.  I've searched all posts since 7/15, and don't see it.  It was there on 7/16, but that was a Sunday and I never signed back on that day.
